mapper.select: SELECT shops_number, shops_name, shops_branch_name, shops_road_address, shops_working_hours, shops_phone, shops_takeout, shops_intro_text FROM tbl_shops WHERE = #{shopsNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SHOPS_FAVORITES (favorites_number, users_number, favorites_shops_number, favorites_created_date) VALUES(1, 4, 2, SYSDATE);
